rules_text:
Menace
Whenever Watchers of the Veil leaves your graveyard or one or more cards leave your graveyard while Watchers of the Veil is on the battlefield, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
flavor_text: [i]“The borders thin. The worlds take shape. For both sides' sake, someone has to serve.”[/i]
notes:
reanimator arcun

turn into a big beater
